scripts.libs: cross-env NODE_ENV=production browserify src/libs.js | uglifyjs -c > bin/libs.js
scripts.minify: uglifyjs -c -- bin/index.js > bin/index.min.js && shx mv bin/index.min.js bin/index.js
scripts.clean: shx rm -f bin/*.js && shx rm -f bin/*.map
scripts.release: npm run clean && npm run libs && npm run build && npm run minify
